name: Handy Device Locator App
description:
A handy App helps locate a missing item or device.


You carry your devices everywhere. That means you may leave them anywhere. You won't have to worry about them getting lost for very long, whether they're under a sofa pillow or in a conference room. By using the Handy app. you can easily locate your iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, Mac, AirPods, and many other devices.
